name: webvr-polyfill
description: Use WebVR today, on mobile or desktop, without requiring a special browser build.

scripts.build-all: npm run build && npm run build-min
scripts.version: npm run build-all && git add build/*
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm publish
